extendedInfo.description: Manage your accounts on the GO with Fairmont Federal Credit Unionâs Mobile Banking. You can access your accounts 24/7 from anywhere. Plus it is  free and easy to use! Mobile Banking allows you to : - Transfer funds between your accounts. - Check your account balances and history. - Set up Email and/or Text Alerts for various types of account activity. - Customize account names. ... and more! For details or to find a full service office near you go to http://www.fairmontfcu.com. Go Mobile and let it work for you anytime, anywhere. Please note, a User ID and password, separate from Home Banking, is required to obtain access to Fairmont Federal Credit Union's mobile banking application. Please visit one of our full service locations or call our Information Center during business hours at 304-363-5320, Option 1 to sign up. Without a User ID and password, you will be unable to sign in with this application. There is no charge from Fairmont Federal Credit Union. Your mobile carrierâs text messaging and web access charges may apply.

reviews.title: Got to have it
reviews.comment: Hey if u have this app and its not working you have to got to a Fairmont credit union bank to get it set up it the only way you can get it to work. After that it is easy. Very useful
reviews.author: Kwame Govine

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Love that it is so simple to check my account.  Call or stop by to setup the app and you\'re set!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Works flawlessly on my android. Don\'t pay attention to the idiots who say they can\'t type in their username because it won\'t accept letters, your username is your phone number.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Everyone was complaining that only numbers show up for the username but they dont realize that the username is your cell number.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t log in because it won\'t accept letters.
reviews.comment: This will not accept letters in your username.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: You have to stop in to a Fairmontfcu office and set it up to work on your phone.  But then it is great.
reviews.author: A Google User
